tfpcbpggsz.phasecorrection module

class PhaseCorrection[source]

Bases: object

Class for phase correction

PhaseCorrection()[source]

The phase correction for the given coordinates .. math:: delta_{corr} = sum_{i=0}^{order} sum_{j=0}^{(order-i)/2} C_{2j+1} P_i(z’_{+})P_{2j+1}(z^’’_{-})

bias(coords, index)[source]

Calculates the bias value at the given coordinates using a Gaussian model.

do_bias()[source]

Returns True if the phase correction is for adding bias, set defult parameter first

eval_bias(coords)[source]

Returns the bias for the given coordinates

eval_corr(coords)[source]
eval_corr_norm(coords)[source]

Returns the phase correction for the given coordinates

gaussianExponential(s, mu, sigma)[source]

Returns the exponential term of the Gaussian model for the given coordinates exp(-((s-mu)/sigma)^2)

legendre(s, n)[source]

Returns the nth order Legendre polynomial of the given coordinate

polynomial(s, i, j)[source]

Returns the nth order polynomial of coordinate x, where the coordinate is based on the SRD coordinates x: SRD coordinate[Z’, Z’’]

set_coefficients(coefficients)[source]

Sets the coefficients for the phase correction

coefficients: dict or list

The coefficients for the phase correction

term_to_string(i)[source]

Returns the string representation of the term
